question:
We have long imagined the possibility that life exists on other planets . Do you believe that there is life in the universe outside of earth? What would be the implications of proving that alien life exists? 
Give reasons for your answer and include any relevant examples from your own knowledge and experience.
text: With the pace of 21st-century technology is lept to the level which was unimaginable a few decades ago . Due to the advancement we all starts to believe that there is life existence on other planets . Although I am also one of them who argue that there is existence on the other globe , there are many ways to prove that there are creatures out of the globe .

Nevertheless, there are much evidence provided by our scientists , there is existence on another planet. For instance , as our scientists went to the moon for their research , they find a footprint of any creature they took a picture and sample of that to the earth . Moreover, even though after much research on the planets , they took more steps towards the success of their goal .

There are many points to give proof that aliens life exists. First and foremost , By doing more and more researches . To illustrate ,  if the researchers do many and more researches like they check the oxygen , gravity and so on , they will able to prove that their is the existence on another planet . In addition , make the suitable devices .  For example , in spite of doing research , the equipment should be suitable and more effective , the outcome can be more strong and effective .

In conclusion , even though by the proofs given by researchers we comes to know that their is life out of the earth , it they find more they will be able to give a strong point regarding to this. I totally believe that there is life on another plan

error_list.error_des: It appears that you are missing a comma after the introductory phrase Due to the advancement. Consider adding a comma.
The verb starts does not seem to agree with the subject. Consider changing the verb form.
The plural form of be are does not seem to agree with the singular subject much evidence. Consider changing the verb form.
It seems that you are missing a verb. Consider adding it.
The word their may be used incorrectly. Review the following notes to determine the appropriate usage for your context.

The preposition to after regarding may be unnecessary. Consider removing the second preposition.
